analysis.description:
DGB.startDate (/unique_chucks/35/0xc96021a0088fdbf05a86e01e69c39120fe3e06da.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/35/0xc96021a0088fdbf05a86e01e69c39120fe3e06da.sol#220-232)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/35/0xc96021a0088fdbf05a86e01e69c39120fe3e06da.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/35/0xc96021a0088fdbf05a86e01e69c39120fe3e06da.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/35/0xc96021a0088fdbf05a86e01e69c39120fe3e06da.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
